src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Where can we eat ? [MASK] RC : ARI , the person that I 'm accompanying feels intimidated by by you , and and they 'd like to know where they can eat . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : Are there toilets ? And where are they ? [MASK] RC : I 'm asking on behalf of the person that I 'm accompanying , who is asking me , well , where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] LP : Are they accessible by disabled people ? [MASK] RC : My ... My friend does n't walk very well , can he get into the toilets with his ... [MASK] LP : Wheelchair . RC : his wheelchair ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] LP : I have an appointment in room 17 , where is it ? [MASK] RC : And he 's a bit lost , he has an appointment , he 's been asked to go to , to go to room 17 . Could you tell us where to go , please ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : Is it wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] RC : Is the lift wheelchair accessible ? Can he use the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) LP : I have an appointment at 10 AM , how long ... ah well yes ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : He has an appointment at 10 o'clock . Do you know if there is a waiting time , if he has time for a coffee or do we have to go straight to the treatment room ? # request ( clinic ( busyness ) ) ARI : No , there are n't too many people . The doctor will take you on time . # disaffirm ( ) ; inform ( clinic ( busyness ) ) LP : I do n't know ... # incomplete-da ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? [MASK] ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . [MASK] RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : And what time does it close ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there ... [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] [end] RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? src: [start] LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? [MASK] RC : Yes , I think so . [MASK] RC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where do I go for information ? [MASK] LP : I 'd like a coffee . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] RC : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Which floor is the cafeteria on ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [start] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Where can I get information ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [MASK] [end] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) ; request ( appt ( general_info ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lift ) ) LC : For the lift ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) LC : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LC : What time is it , please ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . [MASK] LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . [MASK] RP : Is there a reception for people who have an appointment like me ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] [end] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . # disaffirm ( ) ; cant-help ( ) LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RP : I can ask ... # incomplete-da ( ) RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( ) ) ARI : No . The cafeteria is open from 11 AM to 3 PM . # disaffirm ( ) ; inform ( cafe ( opening_times ) )
tgt: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . [MASK] LP : Do we have to take the lift ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : So you do n't know how to get to the cafeteria ? Because yesterday ... src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( name ( ari ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : I 'd like to have a little coffee before seeing the doctor . # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) RP : Ah yes , that 's a good idea , so we 'll ... # acknowledge ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) [start] LC : Is there a cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Ok , perfect . [MASK] RP : We 'll be able to have a coffee or something else . Does that suit you ? LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : We 'll go slowly , we have time anyway . LC : Do you have to have coffee at the cafe ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : Ok. We 'll go straight to the counter . [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] RP : Let 's go then . LC : We 'll ask for coffee . LC : Yes , yes . [MASK] LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . LC : Are there many people waiting in radiology ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Ok , it 's clear . [MASK] RP : So maybe we 'll go through the reception area again ? [MASK] LC : Yes , ok. [MASK] RP : We 're going to ask him how to get there . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Now I 'm a little bit lost , I do n't know which corridor we came from . [MASK] LC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : And which corridor to take to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] [end] LC : I may have to go to the toilet before . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) LC : Where are the toilets , please ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . # inform ( location ( toilet ) ) RP : I 'll let you go to the toilet , I 'll wait for you . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

LC : Yes , yes . # affirm ( ) LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Ask how ... [MASK] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you very much ARI . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RP : Yes , I do . I 'd like to know where the cafeteria is , um or , I do n't know , a restaurant here in the hospital ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Um , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : I 'm hard of hearing and the sound is a little low , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : So , another question ... LC : Um , hello . Do you know where the toilets are ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) LC : Thank you . # thank ( )
